#Mise en place des packages 

```{r}
library("knitr")
library("BiocStyle")
.cran_packages <- c("ggplot2", "gridExtra", "devtools")
.bioc_packages <- c("dada2", "phyloseq", "DECIPHER", "phangorn")
sapply(c(.cran_packages, .bioc_packages), require, character.only = TRUE)
```
